sections.heading: functional impairment, defined
sections.text: Substantial functional impairment shall mean a substantial incapability, because of physical limitations, of living independently or providing self-care as determined through observation, diagnosis, investigation, or evaluation.SourceLaws 1988, LB 463, ยง 21.

28-368.Substantial functional impairment, defined.

Substantial functional impairment shall mean a substantial incapability, because of physical limitations, of living independently or providing self-care as determined through observation, diagnosis, investigation, or evaluation.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 463, ยง 21.
